definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: Chaoyang District in Guangdong Province, one of the famous hometown of overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 潮阳区是广东省著名侨乡之一。

sentences.english: Today, I've really got a feel for the charmsof this home of overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我今天算是彻底感受到侨乡的魅力了。

sentences.english: Many overseas Chinese living abroad, is a famous hometown of overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 旅居海外华侨众多，是个著名侨乡。

sentences.english: The world's largest luminous pearl is on display in Wenchang, Hainan Province.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最大的夜明珠在海南侨乡文昌市展出。

sentences.english: The world's largest luminous pearl is on display in Wenchang, Hainan Province, November 21.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最大的夜明珠于21日在海南侨乡文昌市展出。

sentences.english: Guangzhou is famous as a hometown for overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 广州是一个著名的侨乡。

sentences.english: Li Garden of Wuyi over- seas Chinese hometown in Pearl River Delta is the delicate ar't of overseas Chinese Garden in China.
sentences.chinese: 珠三角五邑侨乡的立园，是中国华侨园林的精品。

sentences.english: Danshui Town, located in freshwater coast of Guangdong, long history and is famous hometown of overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 淡水镇地处广东沿海，历史悠久，又是著名的侨乡。

sentences.english: Xiayang Town of Yongding County in Fujian Province is a famous hometown of overseas Chinese in Hakka's area.
sentences.chinese: 福建省永定县下洋镇是客家地区的一个著名侨乡。

definition: Shantou (formerly romanized as Swatow), prefecture-level city in Guangdong
Chinese person who returns to China after living as an expatriate
Hakka ethnic group, a subgroup of the Han that in the 13th century migrated from northern China to the south
Haojiang district of Shantou city 汕头市, Guangdong
Anxi county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian
Quanzhou prefecture level city in Fujian
Pingtan county in Fuzhou 福州[Fu2 zhou1], Fujian
Dabu county in Meizhou 梅州, Guangdong/Tai Po district of New Territories, Hong Kong/Dabu or Tabu township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
Quangang district of Quanzhou city 泉州市[Quan2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
Xuwen county in Zhanjiang 湛江[Zhan4 jiang1], Guangdong
Puning county level city in Jieyang 揭陽|揭阳, Guangdong
Fuqing county level city in Fuzhou 福州[Fu2 zhou1], Fujian
Zhangzhou prefecture level city in Fujian
